form.restrictions: OFFER RESTRICTED TO SMOKERS 21 YEARS OF AGE OR OLDER

questions.question: What is your usual brand/style of cigarettes?
In the last month, what ONE brand have you smoked most?
What other brands have you smoked in the last 3 months?
Which one reason best describes how you feel about your usual brand?
options: A. It's far better than all other brands
B. It's as good as one or two other brands
C. It's the same as most other brands

questions.question: Out of your last 10 cigarette purchases, how many were for Camel?
Do you own a Motorcycle?
options: NC. Are you a serious fan of (check all that apply):

questions.question: How often do you attend motorcycle (biker) events?
During my free time I would be most likely to
options: go to a bar or club

required_info.certification: I certify that I am a smoker, that I am 21 years of age or older, and that I want to receive offers, premiums, or free cigarettes that may be sent to me in the mail. I understand that giving false information in order to accept these offers may constitute a violation of law.
